description: Try our easy to follow White Christmas Layer Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: White Christmas Layer Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To assemble cake, trim tops of cakes, if necessary, until level and halve through the centre to make 4 layers. Place 1 cake base onto a sheet of baking paper and spread with 1/2 cup buttercream. Repeat with remaining cake layers and buttercream. Using a palette knife, spread top and side of cake with a thin coating of remaining buttercream so cake is partly visible. Decorate cake with shortbread trees and foliage. Dust with icing sugar, transfer to a cake stand and serve.
